Description: Limestone male figure with a shaven head and a toga-like garment with a fringed edge; back-pillar in the form of an obelisk; incised Demotic text at the front of the plinth; head re-affixed.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: House of Ashaikhet, Found in cellar (Petrie)
Curator's comments: Published: PM IV, p. 26 H. Coutts, Gold of the Pharaohs, Edinburgh 1988, p.91 [62]. Petrie, Tanis I, 42, frontispiece (no.7) Brissaud and Zivie-Coche - Tanis 1987-1997, (1998) p. 126, 159, 175 [pls. 23, 29]. Vleeming, Studia Demotica 5, No. 128, pp. 89-90.
